trans-unit.source: Set this parameter to -1 and the control will send the $TBN_GETDISPINFO notification to retrieve the image index when it is needed.

seg-source.mrk: Set this parameter to -1 and the control will send the $TBN_GETDISPINFO notification to retrieve the image index when it is needed.

target.mrk: Set this parameter to -1 and the control will send the $TBN_GETDISPINFO notification to retrieve the image index when it is needed.

trans-unit.source: Set this to -2 to indicate that the button does not have an image.

seg-source.mrk: Set this to -2 to indicate that the button does not have an image.

target.mrk: Set this to -2 to indicate that the button does not have an image.

trans-unit.source: The button layout will only include space for the text.

seg-source.mrk: The button layout will only include space for the text.

target.mrk: The button layout will only include space for the text.

trans-unit.source: If the button is a separator, this is the width of the separator, in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: If the button is a separator, this is the width of the separator, in pixels.

target.mrk: If the button is a separator, this is the width of the separator, in pixels.

trans-unit.source: [optional] 0-based index of the button string that was set with AddString

seg-source.mrk: 0-based index of the button string that was set with AddString

target.mrk: 0-based index of the button string that was set with AddString

trans-unit.source: [optional] Button style. Can be a combination of the following:

seg-source.mrk: Can be a combination of the following:

target.mrk: Can be a combination of the following:

trans-unit.source: $BTNS_AUTOSIZE - The toolbar control should not assign the standard width to the button

seg-source.mrk: $BTNS_AUTOSIZE - The toolbar control should not assign the standard width to the button

target.mrk: $BTNS_AUTOSIZE - The toolbar control should not assign the standard width to the button

trans-unit.source: $BTNS_CHECK - Toggles between the pressed and nonpressed

seg-source.mrk: $BTNS_CHECK - Toggles between the pressed and nonpressed

target.mrk: $BTNS_CHECK - Toggles between the pressed and nonpressed

trans-unit.source: $BTNS_CHECKGROUP - Button that stays pressed until another button in the group is pressed

seg-source.mrk: $BTNS_CHECKGROUP - Button that stays pressed until another button in the group is pressed

target.mrk: $BTNS_CHECKGROUP - Button that stays pressed until another button in the group is pressed

trans-unit.source: $BTNS_DROPDOWN - Creates a drop-down style button that can display a list

seg-source.mrk: $BTNS_DROPDOWN - Creates a drop-down style button that can display a list

target.mrk: $BTNS_DROPDOWN - Creates a drop-down style button that can display a list

trans-unit.source: $BTNS_GROUP - Button that stays pressed until another button in the group is pressed

seg-source.mrk: $BTNS_GROUP - Button that stays pressed until another button in the group is pressed

target.mrk: $BTNS_GROUP - Button that stays pressed until another button in the group is pressed

trans-unit.source: $BTNS_NOPREFIX - The button text will not have an accelerator prefix

seg-source.mrk: $BTNS_NOPREFIX - The button text will not have an accelerator prefix

target.mrk: $BTNS_NOPREFIX - The button text will not have an accelerator prefix

trans-unit.source: $BTNS_SHOWTEXT - Specifies that button text should be displayed

seg-source.mrk: $BTNS_SHOWTEXT - Specifies that button text should be displayed

target.mrk: $BTNS_SHOWTEXT - Specifies that button text should be displayed

trans-unit.source: $BTNS_WHOLEDROPDOWN - Specifies that the button will have a drop-down arrow

seg-source.mrk: $BTNS_WHOLEDROPDOWN - Specifies that the button will have a drop-down arrow

target.mrk: $BTNS_WHOLEDROPDOWN - Specifies that the button will have a drop-down arrow

trans-unit.source: [optional] Button state. Can be a combination of the following:

seg-source.mrk: Can be a combination of the following:

target.mrk: Can be a combination of the following:

trans-unit.source: $TBSTATE_CHECKED - The button has the $TBSTYLE_CHECK style and is being clicked

seg-source.mrk: $TBSTATE_CHECKED - The button has the $TBSTYLE_CHECK style and is being clicked

target.mrk: $TBSTATE_CHECKED - The button has the $TBSTYLE_CHECK style and is being clicked

trans-unit.source: $TBSTATE_HIDDEN - The button is not visible and cannot receive user input

seg-source.mrk: $TBSTATE_HIDDEN - The button is not visible and cannot receive user input

target.mrk: $TBSTATE_HIDDEN - The button is not visible and cannot receive user input

trans-unit.source: $TBSTATE_WRAP - The button is followed by a line break

seg-source.mrk: $TBSTATE_WRAP - The button is followed by a line break

target.mrk: $TBSTATE_WRAP - The button is followed by a line break

trans-unit.source: $TBSTATE_ELLIPSES - The button's text is cut off and an ellipsis is displayed

seg-source.mrk: $TBSTATE_ELLIPSES - The button's text is cut off and an ellipsis is displayed

target.mrk: $TBSTATE_ELLIPSES - The button's text is cut off and an ellipsis is displayed
